Â Â Â Â Â  no but that sounds lovely

Â Â Â Â Â  no..... unless, you are bad

8.2.20  7:27 pm   do you think everyone should compose music at least once in their life

Â Â Â Â Â absolutely not

     or was it just a coincidence

Â Â Â Â Â  there's some videos on youtube of people reacting to lily pads

Â Â Â Â Â  oh that's weird i didn't think i was allowed to ask questions here

Â Â Â Â Â  could be you

8.2.20  5:46 pm   what's your favourite dinosaur

Â Â Â Â Â  whichever one is the least extinct at any particular moment

8.2.20  5:32 pm   i am trying really hard to get back on writing after a month, but my mind does not want to. why is creating so difficult? 

Â Â Â Â Â  why are you trying to do something that your mind doesn't want to do... there might be good reasons but i am curious as to which reason it is

Â Â Â Â Â  because they scurry, and are also swirly

Â Â Â Â Â  they are both the same unless there has been some huge mistake

Â Â Â Â Â that is true. please report. i've already reported it once but i don't think the reports are very effective if they all come from the same person

Â Â Â Â Â whichever ones i don't recommend will always be the ones which will sound better. that's just the paradox of mother nature

8.2.20  11:57 am   How did you predict the future in "Just Did A Bad Thing"?

Â Â Â Â Â you helped. by selecting only things which seem to have become true, and throwing out any other data that doesn't fit

     Or did you make the future?

Â Â Â Â Â only partially

Â Â Â Â Â  no

Â Â Â Â Â  the blue normal one but i'm still there

Â Â Â Â Â  no it's the anti-sandwich. it removes other sandwiches
